name: Irish Ferries Limited
goal: Irish Ferries is the leading Irish ferry company operating sailings between Ireland and the UK and currently operating sailings between Ireland and France.  It is currently the principal carrier of passengers by sea between Ireland and France and is the principal carrier of passengers between Ireland and Britain.  Irish Ferries carried over 1.5 million passengers on international routes in 2018.  Post-Brexit, it would have sailings to and from third countries as well as intra-EU traffic.  It competes with airlines on such routes.  It is part of the Irish Continental Group (www.icg.ie).
interests: Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
